newsitem.title: FINLAND: RPT-FINNISH 1996 BEER PRODUCTION VOLUME FELL -BREWERS.
newsitem.headline: RPT-FINNISH 1996 BEER PRODUCTION VOLUME FELL -BREWERS.

text.p: one percent last year to 467 million litres from 473 million
litres in 1995, the federation of Finnish brewers said in a
High beer tax boosted private imports of foreign brands,
causing production to fall, it said.
The federation said a survey by Gallup Finland showed that
private imports of beer rose 54 percent last year.
It gave the following statistics (millions of litres):
The federation added that a rise in production of other
beverages and mineral waters lifted the sector's total
production by one percent to 748 million litres last year.
